phrases: A Fairy Tail ship has just set sail from here.
With 8 teams of wizards aboard, it heads for Tenroujima.
The S Class Wizard Advancement Exam is a big annual event in Fairy Tail.
8 participants, including Natsu, and their chosen partners,
took up the challenge, set this year on the holy ground of Tenroujima.
Who will be the one to open the door to S Class?
Even though it was winter at home...
I think I am going to melt!
I will turn into ice cream and get eaten by Happy!
Because of currents, this area has the same climate all year'round.
I am going to turn into ice cream...
Juvia, are not you hot all bundled up in that?
Keep it away from here, okay?
Wendy did not perform a Troia spell on me!
After all, she is Mest's partner.
I do not care for this chumminess when soon, we are all going to be enemies.
It is hot to be a Man!
I have no idea what that means.
I want to eat ice cream...
I cannot even imagine you as ice cream, Happy...
Who is the One with the Good Luck?
Is that an island on top of the island?
Even from here, I feel magic power in the air around the island.
It is said that long ago,
there were fairies on that island.
Also, in reference to the very first Fairy Tail master,
there is Moebius Vermilion's Sleeping Ground!
Someone who wears no clothes can talk?!
Now, I will announce your first trial.
Usually, the test is split up into different levels.
You see the smoke rising over the shore?
You will find 8 passages, but only one team can enter each passage.
And at the end of each passage, this will happen.
Only the teams that get through this will pass the first trial.
It says Pitched Battle on Erza and Gildarts' faces...
In the Battle route, two teams amongst the eight go head to head,
and only the team that wins can go on.
Pitched Battle is the most difficult route,
as you must defeat a current S Class wizard to proceed.
Calm is a route that can be used to get to the end without fighting.
In this first trial, you are being tested on armed might and luck!
If it is about luck, we have a chance!
There is only a 1 in 8 chance of getting the Silence route.
Theoretically, 6 teams at most can pass this stage.
I cannot get past the path guarded by Gildarts or Erza!
Do not be such a coward!
In a worst-case scenario, only 3 teams would pass this...
I will put the boot to all of'them!
You know what to do, Happy.
We will choose our passage first!
We probably should have sealed them off'til the whole thing's over!
What kind of test would that be then?
Is that kind of thing allowed?!
Well, it is not a race...
If we let them get to the island ahead of us,
they will probably set up runes all over the place!
Right, I can rewrite the spell!
I have known Fried for a long time, too.
Perhaps a more complicated trap would have been a problem,
but I can rewrite a rune like this.
How many more minutes'til it turns off?
Then Levy escaped the rune in just one minute?
He turned the surface of the water to ice!
No, Mest and Wendy are still up here.
If we do not hurry, we will not be able to choose our passage!
I am feeling great magical power coming from the ground.
Which one should we pick, Natsu?
That is got to be E for Erza!
Because I want to take her down, of course!
He is made up his mind that Erza's down this way...
Like they say, saving the best for last.
If I have one good point, it is that I am lucky.
We will make you into an S Class wizard for sure, Cana!
It is lighter in here than I thought it would be.
Because of the Spirit Light bugs, which are summer bugs with glowing bodies.
Do not tell me this is...
So we are supposed to fight you, eh?
Fried and Bickslow are members of the Thunder God Tribe.
Some time ago, in the Battle of Fairy Tail,
Lucy and Cana had a showdown with these two.
The person who could not even touch Fried...
The one who was beaten by Bickslow when Loke was not around to fight for her...
During the first trial to be promoted to an S Class wizard,
Lucy and Cana, the last of the 8 pairs to arrive, took the last passage left.
It turned out to be a Battle route, where two pairs must fight each other.
And what is being tested in this first stage...
It seems only the pair that wins can proceed through there!
I am sorry, but this is as far as you go, Cana.
I am going to be the one to take Laxus's place.
I have got my own reason for becoming an S Class wizard!
But before that, why do not you put on some clothes?
Ladies coming out of the cards?!
You have no sense of decency!
He has a weakness for women!
I will just have to deal with you myself!
That does not work on me!
Make grime and mold Vanish from the bathroom!
Serve Lucy-sama faithfully, even if she acts IRresponsibly!
GO outside and separate the trash!
I thought another woman might be effective...
I do not want to put the hurt on you too much, so hurry up and take a nap!
You are not going to hit my guys!
I am counting on you, Aries!
Just looking at it makes my thoughts fuzzy!
You are not focusing on the problem at hand!
They remember what happened last time, so they underestimated our strength!
You caught me off guard and fogged up my mind...
No way am I going to lose here!
This water is meant for attacking!
It is dangerous to touch it!
Hmph, you will need 100 more years of experience
if you mean to draw a man's attention with a swimsuit.
What the hell are you doing?!
Do not you know the difference between allies and enemies?!
All little girls are my enemy!
What, do you think soft, supple skin equates to justice?!
The way you are, you will never be able to get a boyfriend.
As a woman, you score a zero.
You are acting all cocky just because a couple of men are here?
That is a cheap woman who will stoop to anything!
I have got a date with my boyfriend, so I am going home.
You do not have to say it twice!
All right, I will use this one more time!
The same method will not work twice!
Oh, this is a piece of cheesecake!
It is nice and all that we have confined him, but now what do we do?
We cannot actually win like this, can we?
There has to be a way to break through...
We made it through the first trial!
Are you really sure about this, Fried?
If it were anybody else, I would have gone all out.
I would decided that if we met here on the Battle route, I would throw the fight.
Although the idea that you would have a weakness for women was a bit over the top.
And I was excited about taking Laxus's spot.
That is not the important thing.
It is all about Fairy Tail.
Besides, Laxus will come back some day, count on it.
Did not figure we would actually run into those two.
Hurry up and get out here!
It is not for sure that Erza is on this route...
I took E for Erza's path!
Just up ahead, I will defeat Erza and become an S Class wizard!
You drew the short straw, huh?
You know, I just hate holding back...
Well, the first trial of the test is over.
I do not have to stick around to know the outcome.
When I beat Gildarts, you will be laughing outta the other side of your face!
I think I might get the last laugh.
Well, go ahead and laugh, but you are going to fight too, Happy.
After all, you are my partner.
